ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Truly your Lord is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Indeed your Lord is mighty and merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily your Lord is Immensely Mighty, Ever Compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In this there was certainly evidence (of the Truth), but most of them did not have any faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed your Lord – only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily your Lord, He is truly the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely your Lord is the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely thy Lord, He is the All-mighty, the All-compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo, thy Lord! He is indeed the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: truly, your Lord is the Mighty One, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed your Lord is the All-mighty, the All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, your Lord! He is truly the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, your Lord is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Surely, your Lord is the Almighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:68] And surely your Lord, He is the Mighty, for He wrought vengeance upon the disbelievers by drowning them, the Merciful, to believers, delivering them from drowning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo, thy Lord! He is indeed the Mighty) in retribution against the disbelievers, (the Merciful) towards the believers, since He saved them from drowning. 411
